scenarios.name: Base Configuration
scenarios.description: Default configuration with standard conflict resolution order

scenarios.name: TeleCs Priority First
scenarios.description: Resolve TeleCs assignments before other activities to ensure teleconsultation coverage

scenarios.name: AMI with teleexpertise
scenarios.description: AMI allows teleexpertise with longer duration of 2 hours

scenarios.name: NS with HDJ Rotation
scenarios.description: Use honeymoon_NS_HDJ rotation cycle instead of default

scenarios.name: FL Extended Skills
scenarios.description: Add HTC2 skills to FL doctor profile for more flexibility

scenarios.name: Emergency Coverage Cycle
scenarios.description: Use emergency rotation cycle with minimal changes

scenarios.name: Combined: TeleCs First + EMIT Reduced
scenarios.description: Combine TeleCs priority with reduced EMIT duration

scenarios.name: MG Unavailable (NoMG Cycle)
scenarios.description: Use NoMG rotation cycle when MG doctor is unavailable

scenarios.name: FL TP Thursday
scenarios.description: Change FL doctor's TP (Travail Personnel) day from Wednesday to Thursday
